name: The Peaceful Warrior
description: The Peaceful Warrior is not about being at warâ€” with anything, but about being at peace within self . Regardless of what comes to meet you, test you, judge you, shake you or budge you . You remain unharmed, undisturbed and undisrupted . Protected and connected within your own field and state of sovereign choosing; to be the Light . The only thing able to move you; is the passion coursing through you ; The forward momentum activated by presence . This is One of the many ways of the peaceful warrior
